page.title: 09SHOPS IN SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: The{main shopping areas}are in{Aldwick {Road}and in the{West Street}area.There are no big department stores in this area though these can be found in the town centre. There are ,however,{a {variety of small shops.}These include butchers,grocers, greengrocers, health foods, sports equipment, newagents,art materials ,books and electrical goods. There are also many{souvenir shops which cater for the tourist trade. These shops ,mainly situated along the {Esplanade},are busy in the summertime but not in the winter when many close down. In general people were satisfied with the shops that were available .Some people commented that goods tended to be cheaper in the Town centre. The older people said they would have liked to see more personal service as they found it difficult to find items.
